response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $900,000. Considering its true market value of $1,500,000 to you, this offer represents a significant saving and a wise investment.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms of the sale. I am here to assist you throughout the process.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
